Future aspirations: I would want to hear about any goals or dreams I have for the future, so I can start working towards them now.
Unfulfilled desires: I would want to hear about any unfulfilled desires or passions I have, so I can find ways to pursue them and make them a reality.
Life lessons: I would want to hear about any valuable lessons I have learned from my past experiences, so I can apply them to my present and future decisions.
Relationship advice: I would want to hear about any relationship advice I have for my past or future self, so I can improve my relationships with others.
Career aspirations: I would want to hear about any career aspirations I have, so I can take steps to prepare for them and make them a reality.
